kizuna_battle_a_02:
Have you come out here to the schoolyard for
some training?![npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_03a:
Aha! I knew I could see a fighting spirit burning
behind those eyes of yours![npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_03b:
Ah! Sorry. That was a little rude of me to ask.
I know the point of training isn’t to show off in\r
front of other people.[npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_04:
Why don’t we do a bit of running together here
to get to know each other a little better?[npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_system_01:
You ran three laps around the schoolyard with
Ms. Dendra...
kizuna_battle_a_06: Phew! That really worked up a nice sweat![npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_07: You’ve got a good pair of legs on ya, new kid![npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_08:
A good bout of training sure does make a body
hungry, doesn’t it?[npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_09:
I’ll let you have one of my homemade
sandwiches as my way of saying thanks for\r
running with me today! Feed those muscles![npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_system_02:
Ms. Dendra’s sandwich was dry and had an odd
smell. The taste left much to be desired...
kizuna_battle_a_10: How was it? I hope it was tasty.[npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_11: Sorry. I shouldn’t have asked you that. Heh...[npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_12:
I’m athletic and all, but I don’t know the first
thing about making good food...[npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_13: as your honest reaction just reminded me.[npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_14:
Well, uh...see you later. Enjoy your sore muscles
tomorrow.[npcn:24]
kizuna_battle_a_system_03: You became slightly closer with Ms. Dendra!
